item.description:
So, its almost Spring and its time for much outdoor fun. I have not been to Ragged Mt. in a couple of years but it is a really nice hike. Ragged Mt. is a trap rock peak on the New Britain/Berlin line. We are going to do a 6.0 mile loop on the Preserve Trail. This trail includes sections of the Metacomet and beautiful views.

This trail trap rock and forest. This time of year though, there is no shade without the leaves. Make sure to bring water and snacks as we will be out there no more than 5 hours. Expect mudd, so make sure you are wearing waterproof boots on this expedition.

Sven's Adventure group will be there also. If we co-mingle, its all good.

We are parking on West Lane in Berlin. Its a small area so squish and be creative.
